revised_title: Connectivity and Morphology of Lamina Monopolar Cells in the Dragonfly Sympetrum
tldr: The study analyzes the connectivity and morphology of five monopolar cells in the optic lobe of the dragonfly Sympetrum. The research provides insights into the synaptic connections and possible homologies between cells in different species, contributing to the understanding of the insect visual system.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Neurobiology and Neuroanatomy
